attributes.action: Republican Michele Bachmann attending Baroness Thatcher's funeral.
attributes.additional_details:
It has been announced that notoriously bigoted Republican Michele Bachmann will form part of the delegation attending Baroness Thatcher's funeral.

Given that some of her pronouncements about homosexuality (e.g. "part of Satan") would result in her arrest for inciting hatred in this country, she should be refused entry by the UK Border Authorities.
